channel.title: [525]Object training with xp based on maxhit! [Just 1 lil problem]

item.title: [525]Object training with xp based on maxhit! [Just 1 lil problem]
item.dc:creator: @dragonchain dragonchain
item.description:
@dragonchain wrote:

Don’t worry guy’s I fixed it myself I tried this:

	[code]if (objectId == 23921 && player.getEquipment().get(3) == null) {
	player.animate(422);
	return;
	}[/code]

And it worked.

Read full topic
item.source: [525]Object training with xp based on maxhit! [Just 1 lil problem]

item.title: [525]Object training with xp based on maxhit! [Just 1 lil problem]
item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

Have you tried using -1 instead of null?

if (player.getEquipment().get(3) == -1) {
    player.animate(422);
}

Read full topic
